dct_description_sm: Euromoney Publications Ltd. North Decimal Degree 77.500000 South Decimal Degree -55.983333 East Decimal Degree 180.000000 West Decimal Degree -180.000000 Inset: Europe. With graphs showing debt, inflation, trade balance. Legend is colour-keyed according to the Euromoney 1985/6 country risk rating. Sources: Euromoney Research Department. Economics Unit of American Express Bank Ltd., International Monetary Fund, WhartonEconometrics.
